Articles.Content: Is there anyway to make your Kerbal plant a flag after landing on Xbox One? I can't seem to figure it out.
When you have your kerbal on EVA, click L3 for cursor mode and press B. You'll be able to select "plant flag". If you're in career mode, you need to have an upgraded astronaut complex.

23 minutes ago, MrDave said:

When you have your kerbal on EVA, click L3 for cursor mode and press B. You'll be able to select "plant flag". If you're in career mode, you need to have an upgraded astronaut complex.

Thanks for the info man! Yeah just started playing career guessing that's why I couldn't find the option to plant one.
